Interface KernelSettings

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACCESS4OBJECT
      Properties.
      static String ACTIVATE_BPM
      Boolean (true/false): activate the BPM process mechanism.
      static String ACTIVATE_GROUPS
      Boolean (true/false): activate the Groups Access Mechanism.
      static String BPM_COMPILERLEVEL
      String: 1.5, 1.6 or 1.7 (Default: 1.7) The Java version to be used to compile the bpmn process files.
      static String CLASSPATHS
      String: The path to the libaries the webapp is build on.
      static String DBTIMEZONE
      String: TimeZoneId from Java Definition.
      static String DEACTIVATE_ACCESSCACHE
      Boolean (true/false): deactivate the Caching mechanism for Access.
      static String DEACTIVATE_QUERYCACHE
      Boolean (true/false): deactivate the Caching mechanism for Access.
      static String DEFAULTMENU
      Properties: This Attribute defines the Menu which is added as a DefaultMenu to all Menubars.
      static String JMS_TIMEOOUT
      Integer: timeOut for JMS sessions.
      static String LOGIN_MAX_TRIES
      Integer: Maximum number of tries to login with the wrong Password into eFaps, before the User is going to be deactivated.
      static String LOGIN_TIME_RETRY
      Integer: This attribute defines the time in minutes which must elapse after trying n-times to login with the wrong password, before the user has again the possibility to try to login.
      static String MSGTRIGGERACTIVE
      Boolean (true/false): Key for the SystemConfiguration attribute that activates the SystemMessage Trigger.
      static String MSGTRIGGERINTERVAL
      Integer :Key for the SystemConfiguration attribute that sets the Interval for the SystemMessage Trigger.
      static String PROFILES4UPDATE
      Profiles to be applied on update if not specified explicitly.
      static String PWDLENGHT
      Integer: The Minimum length of a new Password.
      static String PWDSTORE
      Properties: PasswordStore Digester Configuration.
      static String PWDTH
      Integer: The Threshold of how many passwords hashs will be stored to compare it with a new given password.
      static String QUARTZPROPS
      Properties: Key for the SystemConfiguration attribute that contains the properties for the Quartz Scheduler.
      static String REQUIRE_PERSON_UUID
      Boolean (true/false): activate the BPM process mechanism.
      static String SHOW_DBPROPERTIES_KEY
      Boolean (true/false): show the Keys for the DBProperties..
      static String UPDATE_ACTIVATEJSCOMPWAR
      Boolean (true/false): activate the Javascript Compiler Warning mechanism.
      static String UPDATE_DEACTIVATEJSCOMP
      Boolean (true/false): deactivate the Javascript Compression mechanism.
      static UUID USER_PERSON_ADMINISTRATOR
      Fixed UUID of the Main Administrator Person.
      static UUID USER_ROLE_ADMINISTRATION
      Fixed UUID of the Main Administration Role.
      static String USERUI_DISPLAYPERSON
      String: activate the BPM process mechanism.

    • Field Detail

      • USER_PERSON_ADMINISTRATOR

        static final UUID USER_PERSON_ADMINISTRATOR
        Fixed UUID of the Main Administrator Person.

      • USER_ROLE_ADMINISTRATION

        static final UUID USER_ROLE_ADMINISTRATION
        Fixed UUID of the Main Administration Role.

      • ACTIVATE_BPM

        static final String ACTIVATE_BPM
        Boolean (true/false): activate the BPM process mechanism. Default: false;
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BPM_COMPILERLEVEL

        static final String BPM_COMPILERLEVEL
        String: 1.5, 1.6 or 1.7 (Default: 1.7) The Java version to be used to compile the bpmn process files. The valeu will be send to the ECLISPE Compiler by using the setting for "drools.dialect.java.compiler.lnglevel".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTIVATE_GROUPS

        static final String ACTIVATE_GROUPS
        Boolean (true/false): activate the Groups Access Mechanism. Default: false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHOW_DBPROPERTIES_KEY

        static final String SHOW_DBPROPERTIES_KEY
        Boolean (true/false): show the Keys for the DBProperties..
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUIRE_PERSON_UUID

        static final String REQUIRE_PERSON_UUID
        Boolean (true/false): activate the BPM process mechanism.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USERUI_DISPLAYPERSON

        static final String USERUI_DISPLAYPERSON
        String: activate the BPM process mechanism.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOGIN_MAX_TRIES

        static final String LOGIN_MAX_TRIES
        Integer: Maximum number of tries to login with the wrong Password into eFaps, before the User is going to be deactivated. To deactivate this mechanism set the value to 0.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOGIN_TIME_RETRY

        static final String LOGIN_TIME_RETRY
        Integer: This attribute defines the time in minutes which must elapse after trying n-times to login with the wrong password, before the user has again the possibility to try to login. To deactivate this mechanism set the value to 0.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEACTIVATE_ACCESSCACHE

        static final String DEACTIVATE_ACCESSCACHE
        Boolean (true/false): deactivate the Caching mechanism for Access. Default: false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEACTIVATE_QUERYCACHE

        static final String DEACTIVATE_QUERYCACHE
        Boolean (true/false): deactivate the Caching mechanism for Access. Default: false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JMS_TIMEOOUT

        static final String JMS_TIMEOOUT
        Integer: timeOut for JMS sessions. Default: 0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UPDATE_DEACTIVATEJSCOMP

        static final String UPDATE_DEACTIVATEJSCOMP
        Boolean (true/false): deactivate the Javascript Compression mechanism. Default: false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UPDATE_ACTIVATEJSCOMPWAR

        static final String UPDATE_ACTIVATEJSCOMPWAR
        Boolean (true/false): activate the Javascript Compiler Warning mechanism. Default: false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QUARTZPROPS

        static final String QUARTZPROPS
        Properties: Key for the SystemConfiguration attribute that contains the properties for the Quartz Scheduler.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSGTRIGGERACTIVE

        static final String MSGTRIGGERACTIVE
        Boolean (true/false): Key for the SystemConfiguration attribute that activates the SystemMessage Trigger.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSGTRIGGERINTERVAL

        static final String MSGTRIGGERINTERVAL
        Integer :Key for the SystemConfiguration attribute that sets the Interval for the SystemMessage Trigger.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DBTIMEZONE

        static final String DBTIMEZONE
        String: TimeZoneId from Java Definition.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PWDSTORE

        static final String PWDSTORE
        Properties: PasswordStore Digester Configuration.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PWDTH

        static final String PWDTH
        Integer: The Threshold of how many passwords hashs will be stored to compare it with a new given password.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PWDLENGHT

        static final String PWDLENGHT
        Integer: The Minimum length of a new Password.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULTMENU

        static final String DEFAULTMENU
        Properties: This Attribute defines the Menu which is added as a DefaultMenu to all Menubars. To deactivate this feature set the value to "none". The DefaultMenu can also be deactivated individually in every Command or Menu by setting the Property "TargetDefaultMenu" to "none".
        e.g.:
        Menu0=Common_Main_0Default
        Enabled4Form0=false/true(default:false)
        Enabled4Table0=false/true(default:true)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CLASSPATHS

        static final String CLASSPATHS
        String: The path to the libaries the webapp is build on. Needed for compilation of java and Jasperreports. e.g. "/tmp/Jetty_0_0_0_0_8060_efaps.war__efaps__.bo28gn/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCESS4OBJECT

        static final String ACCESS4OBJECT
        Properties. Can be Concatenated. e.g. for Archives:
        Archives_ArchiveRoot.Role.AsList=Role1;Role2
        Archives_ArchiveRoot.Role.SimpleAccess4Type=Archives_Admin
        Archives_ArchiveRoot.AccessSets=Archives_Modifier
        Archives_ArchiveNode.ParentAttribute=ParentLink
        Archives_ArchiveFile.ParentAttribute=ParentLink
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROFILES4UPDATE

        static final String PROFILES4UPDATE
        Profiles to be applied on update if not specified explicitly. Properties. Can be Concatenated. e.g. for Archives:
        eFapsApp-Sales=Role.AsList=ubicaciones;products
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
